I cannot recommend this game. The game is super unique and pretty fun but has some HORRIBLE ideas. Matchmaking is still broken, 4 YEARS AFTER LAUNCH. As a suv you get people who are several ranks below you, but usually the same rank. But when i play killer i get people who are double my rank, with OP perks that just wrecks me as a rank 14 killer i get rank 9-1 suvs. Super fun to play killer when you get owned so hard with teabagging suvs that smap EZ WIN in the chat. That is so much fun. I know "git gud" is a thing here but there is no chance with people who has the meta perks PLUS thousands of hours. So "gitting gud" is just a lesson in how much suffering you are willing to endure. 

Broken perks/addons. Killers have Hex ruin/undying combo that needs to be nerfed but suvs have Unbreakable, DS, Dead hard, Borrowed Time withs addons such a keys, instaheals and insta blind flashlights. You can still win but playing killer is always an upphill battle, suvs have so much more and when you have 4 fucking people with all of this then you HAVE to play Ruin/undying in order to have a chance. I feel so much more stressed playing kille then suv. Suvs have some shit to deal with to ofc like ruin/undying and camper killers etc. But nowhere near the shit you have to deal as a killer. I play suv to fucking relax and to have a heartpumping experience to play killer. Just that is mind boggling. 

Useless perks and bad killers. There are a TON of just useless perks for killers and suvs that ....just sit in your inventory that YOU WILL NEVER USE. 
Some killers are just way better when there are killers that are left out in the cold like Clown, Wraith, Pig and Trapper. Your experience does matter a lot in this game but then it is your skill and not the killers power that does things. 

So. Much. Grinding. You want to make a fun build with paring perks from other killers? Well fuck you, just play for around 40 hours to get that build You just have to play with 1-3 killers to level them up to make their perks teachable to others AND THEN level up the actual killer that you want. I have made one fucking unique build and i took around 40 hours to make. The shards to make you able to buy killers and perks take fucking forever to make. 67 hours and i have enough to buy ONE FUCKING KILLER. AND that applies to the customization of the game, i am a bit fair for the monetezation model since it is a 20 Euro game but it costs so much just to get some other looking clothes. 

This game is sometimes super fun and one of the more unique game out there and even if i shit on it i will come back to it but there are some GLARING PROBLEMS HERE 4 YEARS AFTER LAUNCH. I get that it might be a smaller team here but they should have enough to actually make this game better. But still this is unacceptable. Honestly just making it easier to get shards and bloodpoints so i do not have to fucking suffer for ages just to play how i want would make me so much happier.

Until the matchmaking system is fixed this game is unplayable for new players in its current state. A level one killer with one level one perk should never be put into a match with highest rank players; dancing around you, doing this so-called "Tea-bagging" animation that is supposed to me F-You or something and theres something called Survive With Friends where people team up over voice chat. I understand things come with time but having to learn to swim being thrown into a whirlpool will make you regret your choices.

i'm just gonna give an honest opinion, don't play this unless you have friends to dick around with, or are ready for a challenge because this game gets toxic quick. i recommend looking up other people playing it first so you can get a grasp on whats going on and what to do. thankfully the game gets easy when you first start as you'll start with other newbies, but be warned, this game works on a matchmaking system. the better you do, the more competitive and hard the game gets. If you want to have a fair chance in lower ranks don't play on or around the 13th of each month, as that is when the ranks reset and all high level players are either booted back, or stay in their area.

now that we have the bad out of the way, Welcome To Dead By Daylight, its a fun little survivor horror game. Me and my friends have spent hours playing this game yet there is still so much left for us to do. The game works like this, you can play as a survivor with up to 3 friends. Your objective is to fix 5 generators on the map, not to worry there is always 7 generators per map. survive long enough to get to the escape door. open it and you're free. Be careful as this game plays by three strikes and you're out. When downed, you are put on a meat hook and must wait for others to come get you, or you can get off early if you have the perks  or luck to do so. Be put on the hook three times and you are officially out of that match. Each playable  character has their own abilities that if you work hard at, can share their abilities with everyone. For example, take Dwight, the man who most start out with as he is both the easiest, and has a big focus on completing generators. If you get him to rank 30 to 50, you unlock all three of his perks for others. Each survivor can hold up to 4 perks at a time so choose wisely and craft your loadout. 

On the other side we have the killers. Each killer has their own distinct ability to kill. From Leatherfaces ability to take out a whole room with just his chainsaw, to Ghostface's ability to stalk others quietly, just to take them out with a single swing. Of course not all killers down people in 1 hit thankfully but its up to you to figure out how you stop the survivors from completing Generators, and putting them on meat hooks so they may be sacrificed by the Entity. 

Fair warning, this game has long wait times as this game works on a dedicated surver for each match. Having 5 people connect at once can be a bit so get comfy.

i wouldn't say it's much of a game, it's more of a torture method that people actually enjoy for some reason so what are you waiting for come and join us

Постоянные пробития в окна и паллеты благодаря выделенным серверам которые никак не могут изменить. а зачем? Ведь можно выпустить новый донатный скинчик и срубить бабла с наивных игроков. Хотя нет, вру, выделенные сервера работают оч хорошо только когда ты играешь с челиком с твоего же региона, а если против тебя попадается какой-то американец, то у тебя будет пинг под 300.
Комъюнити. за свои почти 5к наигранных часов узнал о своей жизни намного больше, чем знал сам.
Что касается анти-чита, то это вообще другая история, тебе могут дать бан сразу за смену иконок, а могут не банить годами за то что играешь со спидхаком. 
Что могу сказать, если вы любите гов-но, то эта игра для вас.

/s great game, if you like grindey, pay to unlock perks type of games. if you like microtransactions beyond cosmetics in games with a box price, its fantastic. if you like an unbalenced mess that leaves exploits unfixed for over a year its amazing. if stale metas make your grey matter tingle in excitement then this is the game for you! s\

On a serious note its not aweful when played with friends. when playing survivor with friends its a pvp game unique in its asymetry. While the jump scares get stale with time, there are actually advanced mechanics that are rewarding to master.

if you play alone 1/10 
if you play with friends 5/10

A love-hate relationship.
The concept of the game is great, but it seems that it was developed recently as they need to improve several aspects of the game.
Updates ends up taking a while to be done, often causing poor gameplay.
They really need to encourage the community more, so that it doesn't happen like other games that died due to the negligence of the developers.
Despite the flaws, it is a good game to play with friends.
I hope that they keep paying attention to the complaints of the players and continue to improve the game even more, because I believe the game can still grow a lot if they fix it properly.
